content: I am a highly motivated and capable developer with a passion for learning new things and expanding my skills. After beginning my coding journey with a mix of free and paid online resources, I pursued formal education at North Metropolitan TAFE, where I completed two diplomas in both Front End Development and Back End Development.

During these two programs, I gained valuable experience in liaising with clients, managing and delivering projects, and working collaboratively within a team. I am now seeking new opportunities to leverage my abilities and contribute to an organization while continuing to grow professionally.

Outside of coding, I am an avid photographer who enjoys spending time outdoors, whether it's hiking in the summer or snowboarding in the winter. With a passion for continuous improvement, I read widely and am always looking to increase my knowledge and skill set.
